content: the theo snowflake is part of the snowfall 2019 crochet a-long this pattern is available for free from this page or you can purchase the complete ebook of all 12 snowflake patterns here 1 this pattern includes written instructions only and photo tutorial on stiffening snowflakes there are no charts please check out my other snowflake patterns in my ravelry store here 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/snowfall-crochet-along-2019 2 https //www ravelry com/stores/jessica-wifall-designs
